subject: Frustrations when extending JUnit 4
msgSnippet: Greetings, This past weekend I tried to extend JUnit 4 and it was a very frustrating experience. I have documented what I found at
messageBody:
Greetings,

This past weekend I tried to extend JUnit 4 and it was a very
frustrating experience. I have documented what I found at
http://www.jroller.com/alexRuiz/entry/junit_4_vs_testng_extensibility .

I might be missing something. Feedback will be greatly appreciated.

Best regards,
-Alex.
